project.title: Projects
project.2025: Scaling up the NOMAD service and transition into a government startup
project.2024: Building the NOMAD digital service for the Ministry of Armed Forces of France
project.2023: Creation of a Web3 organization recognized at several global hackathons
project.2022: Public-interest entrepreneur and technical lead of the DASES project for the Ministry of Education
project.2021: Lead Data Scientist focused on reducing water losses at Itron across Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Oceania

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I work across the entire development lifecycle, from application design to production deployment, relying on a modern and proven technical stack.

vision.intro: Trained as an engineer, I have been working for 15 years at the intersection of digital technology and the public interest, leveraging technology to support initiatives that serve the common good.
vision.background: My professional background, spanning the private sector, government ministries, and entrepreneurship, is driven by a dual ambition:
objectives: - To enhance the accessibility, efficiency, and relevance of public services in line with citizens needs.
- To optimize the use of public resources by strengthening internal capabilities and developing sovereign, secure, and fully controlled digital services.
